      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="item4">ITEM </a>4.&#160;&#160;CONTROLS AND PROCEDURES</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Evaluation of Disclosure Controls and
Procedures.</font> As of June 30, 2009, evaluations were performed, under the
supervision and with the participation of management, including our principal
executive officer and principal financial officer, of the effectiveness of the
design and operation of ALLETE&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures (as defined
in Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934
(Exchange Act)). Based upon those evaluations, our principal executive officer
and principal financial officer have concluded that such disclosure controls and
procedures are effective to provide assurance that information required to be
disclosed in ALLETE&#8217;s reports filed or submitted under the Exchange Act is
recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the time periods specified
in the SEC&#8217;s rules and forms and such information is accumulated and
communicated to our management, including our principal executive officer and
principal financial officer, to allow timely decisions regarding required
disclosure.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Changes in Internal Controls.</font>
While we continue to enhance our internal control over financial reporting,
there has been no change in our internal control over financial reporting that
occurred during our most recent fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or
is reasonably likely to materially affect, our internal control over financial
reporting.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="part2">PART </a>II.&#160;&#160;OTHER INFORMATION</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ITEM
1.&#160;&#160;LEGAL PROCEEDINGS</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">None.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ITEM
1A.&#160;&#160;RISK FACTORS</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">None.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ITEM
2.&#160;&#160;UNREGISTERED SALES OF EQUITY SECURITIES AND USE OF
PROCEEDS</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">None.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ITEM
3.&#160;&#160;DEFAULTS UPON SENIOR SECURITIES</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">None.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="item42">ITEM </a>4.&#160;&#160;SUBMISSION OF MATTERS TO A VOTE OF SECURITY
HOLDERS</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;We
held our Annual Meeting of Shareholders on May 12, 2009.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Included
in (c) below.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td style="WIDTH: 54px">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td width="1184">
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
      election of directors, the ratification of the appointment of
      PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as the Company&#8217;s independent registered public
      accounting firm for 2009, and the amendment of Article III and the
      deletion of Article V of ALLETE&#8217;s Amended and Restated Articles of
      Incorporation were voted on at the 2009 Annual Meeting of
      Shareholders.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div><br>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Not

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="item5">ITEM </a>5.&#160;&#160;OTHER INFORMATION</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Reference
is made to our 2008 Form 10-K for background information on the following
updates.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Ref. Page
12 &#8211; Regulated Operations, Minnesota Public Utilities Commission &#8211; First
Paragraph</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On May 2,
2008, Minnesota Power filed a rate increase request with the MPUC. On May 4,
2009, the MPUC issued its order (May Order) on the rate filing, and on June 25,
2009, the MPUC reconsidered the May Order. While the reconsideration order has
not been issued, we expect the MPUC reconsideration to result in an authorized
rate increase of $20.4 million (slightly below the $21.1 million outcome in its
May Order). The May Order allowing a 10.74 percent return on common equity and a
capital structure consisting of 54.79 percent equity and 45.21 percent debt
remains unchanged.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
reconsideration decision reduced Minnesota Power&#8217;s interim rates, which are in
effect between August 2008 and the date final rates are implemented, by $6.3
million annually to approximately $15 million. This increases Minnesota Power&#8217;s
refunding obligation for 2008 and 2009. Any party may appeal&#160;the final
order to the Minnesota Court of Appeals. We will continue collecting interim
rates until the new rates go into effect, which will be after the&#160;appeal
period and all compliance filings are completed and accepted.&#160;Appeal of the
final order or modifications during compliance could affect the final rate
increase.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div><br>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 9pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ALLETE
Second Quarter 2009 Form 10-Q</font></div>
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">40</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ITEM
5.&#160;&#160;OTHER INFORMATION (Continued)</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">With the
May Order, the MPUC also approved the stipulation and settlement agreement that
affirmed the Company&#8217;s continued recovery of fuel and purchased power costs
under the former base cost of fuel that was in effect prior to the retail rate
filing. The transition to the former base cost of fuel will occur upon
implementation of final rates. Any revenue impact associated with the transition
will be identified in the fourth quarter.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As of
June 30, 2009, we recorded a $16.4 million liability, including interest, for
refunds anticipated to be paid to our customers as a result of the MPUC decision
on our retail rate filing. Current year rate refunds totaling $8.3 million have
been recorded on our consolidated statement of income and prior year rate
refunds totaling $7.6 million are stated separately. Interest expense of $0.5
million was also recorded on our consolidated statement of income related to
rate refunds. Refunds will commence when final rates are effective.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Ref. Page
18 &#8211; Employees &#8211; Second Paragraph</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Minnesota
Power, SWL&amp;P and IBEW Local 31, continue to work under contract extensions
of the agreements which expired on January 31, 2009.&#160;On April 10, 2009,
IBEW Local 31 requested binding arbitration in accordance with the provisions of
the contracts.&#160;The contracts also provide Minnesota Power and SWL&amp;P
with the protections of no strike clauses.&#160;Arbitrations are scheduled in
October with final resolutions anticipated in November 2009.&#160;We remain
optimistic that we will achieve a fair and equitable result in both
agreements.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Ref. Page
20 &#8211; Executive Officers of the Registrant</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <div align="justify">
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">

              </td>

              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="21%">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">January

            <tr bgcolor="#cceeff">
              <td valign="top" width="63%">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">President
      and Chief Executive Officer</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="21%">

      21, 2004</font></div>
              </td>

total authorized number of shares of capital stock of this Corporation shall be
83,616,000 of which 116,000 shares of the par value of $100 each shall be 5%
Preferred Stock, 1,000,000 shares without par value shall be Serial Preferred
Stock, 2,500,000 shares without par value shall be Serial Preferred Stock A and
80,000,000 shares without par value shall be Common Stock. Any of the aforesaid
shares may be issued and disposed of by the Board of Directors at any time and
from time to time, to such persons, firms, corporations, or associations, upon
such terms and for such consideration as the Board of Directors may, in its
discretion, determine, except as may be limited by law or by these Articles of
Incorporation.</font></div>

                </td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="7%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">12</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr bgcolor="#cceeff">
                <td colspan="2" valign="bottom" width="14%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                <td colspan="2" valign="bottom" width="7%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                <td colspan="2" valign="bottom" width="56%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                <td valign="bottom" width="7%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr bgcolor="white">
                <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="bottom" width="14%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">ARTICLE
      12</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" colspan="4" valign="bottom" width="63%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Definitions</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="7%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">13</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          </div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ALLETE</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">AMENDED
AND RESTATED</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">NON-EMPLOYEE
DIRECTOR COMPENSATION DEFERRAL PLAN II</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Effective
May 1, 2009</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
1</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Establishment and
Purpose</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">This
document includes the terms of the ALLETE Amended and Restated Non-Employee
Director Compensation Deferral Plan II, the purpose of which is to provide
Directors an opportunity to elect to defer his or her Annual
Retainer.&#160;&#160;The Plan is a successor to the ALLETE Director Compensation
Deferral Plan (the &#8220;Predecessor Plan&#8221;).&#160;&#160;On December 31, 2004, the
Company froze the Predecessor Plan, and on January 1, 2005, the Company
established the Plan to govern amounts initially deferred after
December&#160;31, 2004 and investment earnings thereon.&#160;&#160;From January
1, 2005 to the effective date hereof, the Company operated and administered the
Plan in all material respects in good faith compliance with the applicable
requirements of Section 409A, the final and proposed Treasury Regulations, IRS
Notice 2005-1, and all other IRS guidance.&#160;&#160;Effective January&#160;1,
2009, the Company amended and restated the Plan in its entirety to comply with
Section 409A.&#160;&#160;Effective May 1, 2009, the Company further amends and
restates the Plan to expand the types of compensation that Directors may
defer.&#160;&#160;Capitalized terms, unless otherwise defined herein, shall have
the meaning provided in Article 12.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
2</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Administration</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.1&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Administrator</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The
      Executive Compensation Committee of the Board shall administer the
      Plan.&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Administrator may
      delegate any of its duties to such other person or persons from time to
      time as it may designate.&#160;&#160;Members of the Executive Compensation
      Committee may participate in the Plan; however, any Director serving on
      the Executive Compensation Committee shall not vote or act on any matter
      relating solely to himself or
herself.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.2&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Duties</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The
      Administrator has the authority to construe and interpret all provisions
      of the Plan, to resolve any ambiguities, to adopt rules and practices
      concerning the administration of the Plan, to make any determinations and
      calculations necessary or appropriate hereunder, and, to the maximum
      extent permitted by Section 409A, the authority to remedy any errors,
      inconsistencies or omissions.&#160;&#160;The Company shall pay all
      expenses and liabilities incurred in connection with Plan
      administration.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.3&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Agents</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The
      Administrator may engage the services of accountants, attorneys,
      actuaries, investment consultants, and such other professional personnel
      as are deemed necessary or advisable to assist in fulfilling the
      Administrator&#8217;s responsibilities.&#160;&#160;The Administrator, the
      Company and the Board may rely upon the advice, opinions or valuations of
      any such persons.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.4&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Binding
      Effect of Decisions</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The
      decision or action of the Administrator with respect to any question
      arising out of or in connection with the administration, interpretation
      and application of the Plan and the rules and regulations promulgated
      hereunder shall be final, conclusive and binding upon all persons having
      any interest in the Plan.&#160;&#160;Neither the Administrator, its
      delegates, nor the Board shall be personally liable for any good faith
      action, determination or interpretation with respect to the Plan, and each
      shall be fully protected by the Company in respect of any such action,
      determination or interpretation.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.5&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Company
      Information</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;To enable
      the Administrator to perform its duties, the Company shall supply full and
      timely information to the Administrator on all matters relating to the
      Annual Retainer, the Directors, the date and circumstances of a Director&#8217;s
      Separation from Service, and other pertinent information as the
      Administrator may reasonably
require.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
3</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Participation</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Directors
may participate in the Plan.&#160;&#160;Each Plan Year, the Administrator shall
notify Directors of their eligibility to participate in the Plan and defer
compensation to be paid on account of services as a Director during the next
Service Period.&#160; A Director who is eligible to participate shall become a
participant by completing an election form on which the Director elects to defer
some or all of his or her Annual Retainer and delivering the completed form to
the Company as specified in the Plan.&#160;&#160;The terms of this Plan shall
continue to govern a Director&#8217;s Accounts until the Accounts are paid in
full.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
4</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Deferral
Elections</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4.1&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Annual
      Deferral Election</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;Each Plan
      Year, a Director may elect:&#160;&#160;(i) to defer some or all of the
      Director&#8217;s Annual Cash Retainer, the Annual Stock Retainer, or both,
      attributable to the next Service Period; and (ii) to the extent permitted
      by this Plan, the time and form of distribution of Cash Deferrals and
      Stock Deferrals.&#160;&#160;Elections become irrevocable no later than the
      date specified by the Administrator, but in any event before the beginning
      of the Plan Year with which or during which occurs the Service Period to
      which the elections relate.&#160;&#160;A Director&#8217;s election will become
      effective only if the forms required by the Administrator have been
      properly completed and signed by the Director, timely delivered to, and
      accepted by, the Administrator.&#160;&#160;A Director who fails to file
      the election before the required date will be treated as having elected
      not to defer any portion of the Annual Retainer for the following Service
      Period.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4.2&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Initial
      Deferral Election.</font>&#160;&#160;A Director who first becomes eligible
      to participate in the Plan during a Plan Year may elect to defer some or
      all of the Director&#8217;s Annual Cash Retainer and Annual Stock Retainer by
      filing a signed election form with the Administrator no later than 30 days
      after the Director first becomes eligible to participate in the
      Plan.&#160;&#160;Such election shall be effective only with respect to the
      Director&#8217;s Annual Retainer earned after the filing of such
      election.&#160;&#160;The election shall become irrevocable with respect to
      the Service Period covered by the election on the 30th day following the
      date on which the Director first becomes eligible to participate in the
      Plan.&#160;&#160;This election relating to initial participation in the
      Plan is available only to Directors who do not participate in any other
      nonqualified deferred compensation elective account balance plans (within
      the meaning of Section&#160;409A) maintained by the Company or any Related
      Company.&#160;&#160;If a Director whose participation in the Plan is
      terminated again becomes a Director, he or she may elect to defer pursuant
      to this Section only if the Director was ineligible to defer compensation
      in this Plan and all other Related Company elective account balance plans
      for the 24 months preceding the date on which the Director again became
      eligible to participate in this
Plan.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4.3&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Cancellations
      of Deferral Elections due to Unforeseeable Emergency.</font>&#160;&#160;If
      a Director experiences an Unforeseeable Emergency, the Director may submit
      to the Administrator a written request to cancel Deferrals for the Service
      Period to satisfy the Unforeseeable Emergency.&#160;&#160;If the
      Administrator either approves the Director&#8217;s request to cancel Deferrals
      for the Service Period, or approves a request for a distribution of prior
      Deferrals in accordance with Section 6.1.3, then effective as of the date
      the request is approved the Administrator shall cancel the Director&#8217;s
      deferral elections for the remainder of the Service Period.&#160;&#160;A
      Director whose Deferrals are canceled in accordance with this section may
      elect Deferrals for the following Service
  Period.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
5</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Accounts</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.1&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Accounts</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The Company
      will establish notional accounts and sub-accounts for each Director as the
      Administrator deems necessary or advisable from time to
      time.&#160;&#160;The Company will establish a Director&#8217;s Accounts during
      the year in which the Director first elects to defer any
      amounts.&#160;&#160;All amounts in a Director&#8217;s Accounts are fully vested
      at all times.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal">5.2</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Cash
      Account</font>.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.2.1&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Establishment
      of Cash Account</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The Company
      shall establish and maintain a Cash Account for each Director who has
      elected to defer any portion of the Annual Cash Retainer.&#160;&#160;A
      Director&#8217;s Cash Account shall be credited as appropriate for Cash
      Deferrals and earnings with respect to Cash Deferrals and debited for
      distributions from the Cash
Account.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.2.2&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Timing
      of Credits to Cash Accounts</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;No later
      than the end of the calendar year during which the Company would otherwise
      have paid the Annual Cash Retainer to the Director but for the Director&#8217;s
      deferral election, the Administrator shall credit the Director&#8217;s Cash
      Account with an amount equal to the portion of the Annual Cash Retainer
      that the Director elected to defer.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.2.3&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Investments</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The
      Administrator may select investment funds to use for measuring notional
      gains and losses with respect to Cash Deferrals.&#160;&#160;The
      Administrator will establish, from time to time, rules and procedures for
      allowing each Director who has not had a Separation from Service to
      designate which one or more of the selected investment funds will be used
      to determine the notional gains and losses credited or debited to the
      Director&#8217;s Cash Account prior to Separation from
  Service.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.2.4&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Valuation
      Date</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;As of each
      Valuation Date, each Cash Account will be adjusted to reflect the effect
      of notional investment gains or losses, additions, distributions,
      transfers and all other transactions with respect to that account since
      the previous Valuation Date.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal">5.3</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Stock
      Account</font>.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.3.1&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Establishment
      of Stock Account</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The Company
      shall establish and maintain a Stock Account for each Director who has
      elected to defer any portion of the Annual Stock Retainer.&#160;&#160;A
      Director&#8217;s Stock Account shall be credited as appropriate for Stock
      Deferrals and Dividend Equivalents and debited for distributions from the
      Stock Account.&#160;&#160;Stock Deferrals credited to a Director&#8217;s Stock
      Account shall be used solely as a device for determining the number of
      shares of Common Stock to be distributed to such Director at a later time
      in accordance with this Plan.&#160;&#160;Stock Deferrals credited (and the
      Common Stock to which the Director is entitled under this Plan) shall be
      subject to adjustment in accordance with Section 5.3.4 of this
      Plan.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.3.2&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Credits
      to Stock Accounts</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The
      Administrator shall credit a Director&#8217;s Stock Account with Stock Deferrals
      as of the day on which the Annual Stock Retainer would otherwise have been
      paid to the Director pursuant to the Stock Plan but for the Director&#8217;s
      deferral election.&#160;&#160;The number of Stock Deferrals credited to
      the Stock Account shall equal the number of shares of Common Stock that
      would have been issued to the Director pursuant to the Stock Plan in the
      absence of a deferral election.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.3.3&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Dividend
      Equivalents</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;Stock
      Deferrals credited to a Director&#8217;s Stock Account shall be credited with
      Dividend Equivalents equal to cash dividends that are declared and paid on
      Common Stock.&#160;&#160;The Company will credit each Director&#8217;s Stock
      Account with Dividend Equivalents as of the date that the Company pays a
      dividend on its Common Stock, and will convert the Dividend Equivalents
      into additional Stock Deferrals by dividing the amount of the Dividend
      Equivalents by the Fair Market Value of a share of Common Stock on that
      date.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.3.4&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Adjustments
      in Case of Changes in Common Stock</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;If the
      outstanding shares of Common Stock of the Company are increased,
      decreased, or exchanged for a different number or kind of shares or other
      securities, or if additional shares or new or different shares or other
      securities are distributed with respect to such shares of Common Stock or
      other securities, through merger, consolidation, sale of all or
      substantially all of the property of the Company, reorganization or
      recapitalization, reclassification, stock dividend, stock split, reverse
      stock split, combinations of shares, rights offering, distribution of
      assets or other distribution with respect to such shares of Common Stock
      or other securities or other change in the corporate structure or shares
      of Common Stock, the number of Stock Deferrals in a Director&#8217;s Stock
      Account and the kind of shares that may be issued under the Plan or both
      shall be appropriately adjusted by the Committee. Any determination by the
      Committee as to any such adjustment will be final, binding, and
      conclusive.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
6</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Distributions</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.1&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Distributions</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;The Plan
      provides for distributions in a Specified Year, upon a Separation from
      Service or upon an Unforeseeable Emergency.&#160;&#160;As described in
      Section 6.1.1, each Plan Year a Director may elect to have all or a
      portion of the Cash Deferrals, Stock Deferrals, or both, attributable to
      the next Service Period distributed in a Specified Year.&#160;&#160;With
      respect to Deferrals not subject to distribution in a Specified Year, the
      Plan requires distribution upon Separation from Service at a time and in a
      form elected by the Director, or for Directors who fail to elect, at a
      time and in a form specified by the Plan.&#160;&#160;A Director wishing to
      elect a time and form of distribution upon Separation from Service must,
      at the time of the Director&#8217;s initial Deferrals, submit a distribution
      election, which may provide a different time and form of distribution upon
      Separation from Service for Cash Deferrals and Stock
      Deferrals.&#160;&#160;A Director&#8217;s distribution elections are irrevocable
      and will govern the Deferrals to which the election relates until the
      Deferrals covered by the election are paid in full or until subsequently
      changed in accordance with Section 6.3.&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding any
      elections by a Director, all distributions are subject to the provisions
      of Section 6.2.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.1.1&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Specified
      Year</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;A Director
      may elect to receive a distribution of Cash Deferrals and Stock Deferrals
      in the same or different Specified Years.&#160;&#160;The Specified Year(s)
      elected may be no earlier than the third Plan Year beginning after the
      date on which the Director initially elects to receive a distribution in a
      Specified Year.&#160;&#160;Except as otherwise provided in this subsection
      or in Section 6.3, once a Director has elected to receive a distribution
      of Cash Deferrals in a Specified Year, the Director may not elect to
      receive a distribution of Cash Deferrals in a different Specified Year
      and, once a Director has elected to receive a distribution of Stock
      Deferrals in a Specified Year, the Director may not elect to receive a
      distribution of Stock Deferrals in a different Specified
      Year.&#160;&#160;Beginning during the year preceding a Specified Year
      previously elected by the Director, the Director may elect to receive a
      distribution of future Deferrals in a later Specified Year, subject,
      however, to the restrictions of this subsection.&#160;&#160;All amounts
      distributable in a Specified Year will be paid in a single lump sum, in
      the case of Cash Deferrals, or in a single distribution of Common Stock,
      in the case of Stock Deferrals.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.1.2&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Separation
      from Service</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;A Director
      may elect to receive a distribution of Deferrals commencing upon
      Separation from Service or during any of the first five years following
      the year of the Separation from Service.&#160;&#160;A Director may elect
      to receive the distribution in the form of a lump sum, annual installments
      over a period of five (5), ten (10), or fifteen (15) years, or a
      combination of both a lump sum and installments.&#160;&#160;A Director may
      elect a different time and form of distribution upon Separation from
      Service for Cash Deferrals and Stock
Deferrals.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.1.3&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Unforeseeable
      Emergency</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;A Director
      may submit a written request for a distribution on account of an
      Unforeseeable Emergency.&#160;&#160;Upon approval by the Administrator of
      a Director&#8217;s request, the Director&#8217;s Accounts, or that portion of the
      Director&#8217;s Accounts deemed necessary by the Administrator to satisfy the
      Unforeseeable Emergency plus amounts necessary to pay taxes reasonably
      anticipated because of the distribution, will be distributed in a single
      lump sum in a manner consistent with Section
  409A.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal">6.2</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Additional
      Distribution
Rules</font>.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.2.1&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Medium
      of Payment</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;All amounts
      in a Director&#8217;s Cash Account shall be paid in cash.&#160;&#160;All amounts
      in a Director&#8217;s Stock Account shall be paid in the form of an equivalent
      number of whole shares of Common Stock.&#160;&#160;Fractional shares may
      be distributed in cash.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal">6.2.2</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Default
      Time and Form of Payment</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;If a
      Director fails timely to elect a time and form of payment, the Director&#8217;s
      Accounts will be distributed upon any Separation from Service in the form
      of a single lump sum payment.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.2.3&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Rules
      Applicable to All Distributions</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;Except as
      otherwise provided in this section, if a Director has elected to receive a
      distribution commencing upon a Distribution Event, or if the distribution
      is required upon Separation from Service, the distribution will commence
      between the date of the Distribution Event and the end of the year in
      which the Distribution Event occurs.&#160;&#160;If a Director has elected,
      or is required, to receive a distribution commencing upon a Distribution
      Event, and the Distribution Event occurs on or after October 1 of a Plan
      Year, the distribution may, to the extent permitted by Section 409A,
      commence after the Distribution Event and on or before the 15<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super">th</font>
      day of the third calendar month following the Distribution Event, even if
      after the end of the year during which the Distribution Event occurs;
      provided, however, the Director will not be permitted, directly or
      indirectly, to designate the taxable year of the
      distribution.&#160;&#160;If a Director has elected to receive a
      distribution commencing during any of the first five years following a
      Separation from Service, the distribution will commence during the year
      elected by the Director.&#160;&#160;If a Director has elected to receive a
      distribution in a Specified Year, the distribution will occur during the
      Specified Year.&#160;&#160;Any distribution that complies with this
      section shall be deemed for all purposes to comply with the Plan
      requirements regarding the time and form of
  distributions.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.2.4&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Installment
      Payments</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;If a
      Director elects to receive distributions in annual installments, the
      Director&#8217;s Account(s) will be paid in substantially equal installments in
      consecutive years over the period elected by the
      Director.&#160;&#160;During the distribution period, the Director&#8217;s Cash
      Account will be credited with interest compounded monthly at a rate of
      7.5% per year, and the Director&#8217;s Stock Account will continue to be
      credited with Dividend Equivalents pursuant to Section 5.3.3, until all
      amounts credited to the Director&#8217;s Accounts have been
      distributed.&#160;&#160;Each annual installment will be paid during the
      Plan Year in which it is due.&#160;&#160;Any installment distribution that
      complies with this section shall be deemed for all purposes to comply with
      the Plan requirements regarding the time and form of
      distributions.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 108pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.2.5&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Death
      After Commencement of Distributions</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;Upon the
      death of a Director after distributions of the Director&#8217;s Accounts have
      commenced, the balance of the Director&#8217;s Accounts will be distributed to
      the Director&#8217;s Beneficiary at the same times and in the same forms that
      the Accounts would have been distributed to the Director if the Director
      had survived.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.3&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Subsequent
      Changes in Time and Form of Payment</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160;&#160;A Director
      may, in accordance with rules, procedures and forms specified from time to
      time by the Administrator, elect to change the time of payment or change
      the form in which the Director&#8217;s Accounts are distributed or both,
      provided that:&#160;&#160;(i) the Director elects at least twelve (12)
      months prior to the date on which payments are otherwise scheduled to
      commence; (ii) the new election does not take effect for at least twelve
      (12) months; and (iii) with respect to changes applicable to distributions
      in a Specified Year or upon Separation from Service, the distributions
      must be deferred for at least five years from the date the distributions
      would otherwise have been paid, or in the case of installment payments,
      five years from the date the installments were scheduled to
      commence.&#160;&#160;For purposes of this section, distributions on
      account of a Specified Year are considered scheduled to commence on
      January 1 of the Specified Year and distributions on account of a
      Separation from Service are considered to commence on the date of the
      Separation from Service, or if the Director has elected to receive a
      distribution of Deferrals commencing during any of the first five years
      following the year of the Separation from Service, January 1 of the year
      elected by the Director.&#160;&#160;Any such election shall be irrevocable
      on the date it is filed with the Administrator unless subsequently changed
      pursuant to this Section.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
